project.name: planet
project.description: Planet Gentoo provides a central aggregation of developers' blogs, to keep users and other developers informed of what they are working on

longdescription.p: For a long time, users have been asking for a better way to find out about what developers are working on within Gentoo, and developers have been wanting a way to communicate with the user and developer communities. Planet Gentoo aims to provide a partial solution to both of these, by aggregating developers' weblogs in one place.

This aggregation is currently available in two forms. Planet Gentoo shows only posts marked as 'on-topic', and related to Gentoo development. Gentoo Universe shows all posts to that developer's blog, for those who are interested in more than strictly Gentoo-related news.
